title: Divyam Diamond Jadau Haaram with Ruby and Emerald Accents
materials: 22K Yellow Gold base with Hyderabadi Polish
features: Intricate Jadau setting showcasing uncut diamonds in a floral pattern. Classic 'gulabi' (rose) motifs throughout the necklace. Features a pear-shaped Ruby and Emerald as centerpieces, embodying auspiciousness. Graceful South Sea pearl drops enhance its traditional appeal. The pendant showcases exquisite filigree work.
colors: contrasted with vibrant ruby red and emerald green. Pearl white for added elegance.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire. Ideal for bridal wear.
description: A statement piece showcasing the rich heritage of Hyderabadi Jadau craftsmanship. High-quality diamonds and gemstones ensure lasting brilliance. This Haaram blends traditional design with modern elegance, making it a timeless investment. The Ruby and Emerald accents symbolize prosperity and good fortune.
